title: riot ticket support won't respond to me !
body:
Hi.

I have sent a ticket to riot support 3 days ago.
As of this moment I have not received a response from riot support. My ticket sits there, open and unresolved and as far as I know unread, even.
i sent another ticket after it and waited 1 day and its still unread and noone replied to me yet 

why ?

here is the  Id 

32551108

replies.body: I was able to see your tickets, but as you can likely imagine, response times are a bit delayed due to the substantial increase in ticket volumes overall. This tends to happen around the end of season. For a little info now, concerning your ticket content, the best way to report people is by using the post game report button. That's your best chance of getting action taken since we'll have the game tied to the report as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xFeZAqVw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-14T03:15:42.953+0000)

thank you for your response , i know that reporting someone in game is the way to do

but you have a tab in ticjet which includs reporting people so i thought why not

besides riot support should not take more than 24 to reply , not 4 days 

but anyway i will be witing for a reply soon thanks !
